name: BCSG, LLC
tag_list: business, coach, advisor, advise, strategy, roi
overview:
Your Licensed Professional Business Advisor

Helping small businesses from the solopreneur to 100 employees through the use of business and personal effectiveness. Providing a 100% money back guarantee if we do not help the business to achieve their goals and put steps in place to take ACTION! If your business is not realizing a return on your investment that is meeting your business needs now & into the future, we are ready to assist you in reaching your goals with services and solutions that WILL exceed your expectations.

We assist buinesses in many areas from Accounting to Warehousing. some of the areas we have expertise in are as follows: Customer Service, Marketing, Sales, Human Resources, Time Management, SMART goals, Action Steps, Financial, Systems, Policies and Procedures, Exit Strategies, Strategic Planning, Business Planning, and more.

Call us if you want more from your business. Your business needs to support your life, not your life supporting your business!
